verses.verse: You <S%H1121>also,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3843>tile,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2710>yourself,<s%> and portray on it a <S%H5892>city,<s%> even <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>

and <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> against <S%H1129>it,<s%> and build <S%H1785>forts<s%> against <S%H8210>it,<s%> and cast up a <S%H5550>mound<s%> against <S%H5414>it;<s%> set <S%H4264>camps<s%> also against <S%H7760>it,<s%> and plant battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> against it all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> for yourself an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4227>pan,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it for a <S%H7023>wall<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> between you and the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H4692>it,<s%> and it shall be besieged, and you shall lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> against <S%H226>it.<s%> This shall be a sign to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Moreover <S%H7901>lie<s%> on your <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on <S%H4557>it;<s%> according to the number of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> on <S%H5375>it,<s%> you shall bear their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

For I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be to you a <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8145>Again,<s%> when you have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> <S%H3615>these,<s%> you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> on your <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> each <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H8141>year,<s%> have I appointed it to <S%H5414>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4692>siege<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> with your <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H2834>uncovered;<s%> and you shall prophesy against <S%H5012>it.<s%>

<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I lay <S%H5688>bands<s%> on <S%H2015>you,<s%> and you shall not turn you from one <S%H6654>side<s%> to the <S%H6654>other,<s%> until you have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H4692>siege.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> for yourself also <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H6321>beans,<s%> and <S%H5742>lentils,<s%> and <S%H1764>millet,<s%> and <S%H3698>spelt,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H4557>it;<s%> according to the number of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> on your <S%H6654>side,<s%> even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> you shall eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>

Your <S%H3978>food<s%> which you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> shall be by <S%H4946>weight,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> a <S%H3117>day:<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> you shall eat <S%H398>it.<s%>
You shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure,<s%> the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin:<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> you shall <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it as <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5692>cakes,<s%> and you shall <S%H5746>bake<s%> it in their <S%H5869>sight<s%> with <S%H1561>dung<s%> that comes <S%H6627>out<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Even thus shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where I will drive <S%H5080>them.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H5315>behold,<s%> my soul has not been <S%H2930>polluted;<s%> for from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> up even until now have I not <S%H398>eaten<s%> of that which dies of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> of <S%H935>animals;<s%> neither came there <S%H6292>abominable<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> into my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> Behold, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H1241>cow<s%>'s <S%H6832>dung<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1561>dung,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> your bread <S%H3899>thereon.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7665>behold,<s%> I will break the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> by <S%H4948>weight,<s%> and with <S%H1674>fearfulness;<s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure,<s%> and in <S%H8078>dismay:<s%>

that they may <S%H2637>want<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H8074>dismayed<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another,<s%> and pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
